summary: This bill, the Strengthening the Rule of Law in the Brazilian Amazon Act, aims to support U.S. investment opportunities and strengthen collaboration with Brazil to combat criminal elements in the Amazon. It defines crimes related to illegal activities in the Amazon, identifies relevant federal agencies, and directs the United States International Development Finance Corporation to explore sustainable economic opportunities. The bill mandates reports to Congress on investment barriers, drivers of deforestation, and the role of China. It also authorizes funding for capacity building and technical assistance to Brazilian agencies, community assistance, and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to leverage U.S. influence in international financial institutions to prioritize sustainable development and oppose activities that contribute to deforestation.
